body.name: Microwave Vegetable Steamer for Cooking Food Basket Rice Veggie Microwavable Cooker Pot Exultimate
body.stockDetail: Only 15 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 16 hrs 13 mins
features: Convenient and versatile cooking options: With a multi-purpose steamer, you can cook a variety of foods with ease, from vegetables and rice to meat and seafood
Healthier meal preparation: Steaming is a healthier cooking method than frying or boiling, as it helps to retain more of the nutrients and natural flavors in your food
Time-saving convenience: By using a microwave steamer or multi-tiered basket, you can prepare your meals quickly and efficiently, without having to constantly monitor a pot on the stove
Easy to clean: Many steamers are designed to be dishwasher safe or have removable components, making them simple to clean up after use

Eco-friendly and cost-effective: Since steaming doesn't require the use of oil or other cooking additives, it can help you save money on groceries and reduce your impact on the environment by cutting down on food waste
body.description: Introducing the ultimate kitchen companion for healthy cooking and meal preparation: our multi-purpose steamer! With its versatile design and range of cooking options, this steamer is the perfect addition to any home cook's arsenal. Whether you're looking to steam vegetables, rice, meat, or seafood, our steamer makes it easy to achieve delicious and healthy results every time. Not only is our steamer an efficient and convenient cooking option, but it also promotes healthier meal preparation by helping to retain more of the natural flavors and nutrients in your food. Plus, it's an eco-friendly and cost-effective choice, as steaming doesn't require the use of oil or other cooking additives. Cleaning up after cooking is a breeze thanks to our steamer's dishwasher safe removable components. And with its durable construction and sleek design, this multi-purpose steamer is sure to be a long-lasting and stylish addition to your kitchen. Experience the convenience and versatility of our multi-purpose steamer for yourself, and elevate your meal prep game to a whole new level.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars amazing reusable steamer for low price
reviews.reviewText: The size, shape, durability and price for this item exceeded my expectations. I enjoy the way this steamer prepares my veggies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this steamer for all my veggies but most especially asparagus. I don have to wait long for anything to cook and my microwave stays lean because of the vent on the cover. I have bought other.pieces of Sistema .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Product for smaller veggies!
reviews.reviewText: It is a sturdy product but a little small for some veggies and you have to cut them up first before steaming!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple no frills
reviews.reviewText: This is a quick and easy to use steamer. It is small but good size for one person. Getting the four snaps closed on the lid is not always easy, but if I get 3 snapped I’m ok and in the microwave it goes. The little white rack makes it easy to lift out and slide your food onto your plate. If you’re looking for something that is 100% error free to use, you probably would not like this. If you’re ok with only getting 2-3 of the 4 lid snaps closed then get it and just know your food will come out nicely steamed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2021
reviews.reviewText: this particular size is too small for the amount of vegetables that I cook at one time. For instance it would not fit an entire head of Broccoli. Seems entirely functional, just too small for my purposes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Use it daily
reviews.reviewText: I have really liked this steamer. Fits perfectly in my small microwave, works great with frozen veggies, super easy to clean. I am considering ordering a second one because of how often I use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Avoid as warped after only 1 use
reviews.reviewText: Right size. But after only 1 use the bottom warped. While it still works, it will no longer sit flat on microwave tray. I would avoid this brand and stick with more robust vendor products

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good little microwave steamer
reviews.reviewText: I like to steam fresh vegetables in the microwave and this steamer does the job. It's easy to clean in the dishwasher or by hand. The white tray will take on some color, like from carrots, but it's not for serving, so no biggie. Happy with my purchase.
Could have longer feet for a little more water. Overall works good.
